title: Simple Watch Face
summary: White/Black for your evening or night
description: Simple Watch Face is a simple looking watch face for your Android Wear device. This watch face is designed to run on different round and square devices  eg LG G Watch, Moto360, etc.Features:* Android Wear Watch Face* Designed with Minimal aesthetics.* Ambient mode supported (White on black background design to protect your OLED screen)Installation:Install the application and the Watch Face will be automatically visible on your compatibile device. To activate the Watch Face, long press on your watch home page, look for the newly installed Watch Face and select it.
descriptionHTML:
Simple Watch Face is a simple looking watch face for your Android Wear device. This watch face is designed to run on different round and square devices eg LG G Watch, Moto360, etc.

Features:
* Android Wear Watch Face
* Designed with Minimal aesthetics.
* Ambient mode supported (White on black background design to protect your OLED screen)

Installation:
Install the application and the Watch Face will be automatically visible on your compatibile device. To activate the Watch Face, long press on your watch home page, look for the newly installed Watch Face and select it.
